General.Name: Black Ridge Oil Gas Inc
General.Description: Sow Good Inc. provides freeze-dried snacks, smoothies, soups, and granola in the United States. The company markets its products through direct-to-consumer focused website, as well as through the business-to-business sales channel. It offers its products under the Sow Good and Sustain Us brands. The company was formerly known as Black Ridge Oil & Gas, Inc. and changed its name to Sow Good Inc. in January 2021. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Irving, Texas.
General.Address: 1440 North Union Bower Road, Irving, TX, United States, 75061
